values: The Legacy of Antioch: Partnering with the Church of the Global South for the Sake of the GospelThe Legacy of Antioch: Partnering with the Church of the Global South for the Sake of the Gospel

As Christianity expands in the global South, the Western church must continue to support the developing church by sending and going.As Christianity expands in the global South, the Western church must continue to support the developing church by sending and going.
